Package andesite

Interface Plugin

public interface Plugin
Entry point for a plugin. Defines the callbacks used to modify the node state or intercept commands.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  Plugin.HookResult
    Used to signal whether or not a payload should be dropped.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default void configurePlayerManager​(NodeState state, com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.player.AudioPlayerManager manager)
    Called to allow configuration of an audio player manager.
    default void configureRouter​(NodeState state, Router router)
    Called to allow injecting custom routes on the provided router.
    default void init​(NodeState state)
    Called when plugin loading is complete.
    default Plugin.HookResult onRawHttpRequest​(NodeState state, RoutingContext context)
    Called when a REST request is received.
    default Plugin.HookResult onRawWebSocketPayload​(NodeState nodeState, WebSocketState wsState, JsonObject payload)
    Called when a websocket payload is received.
    default boolean requiresRouter()
    Whether or not this plugin requires a router to work.
    default boolean startListeners​(NodeState state)
    Starts custom listeners for this plugin.

  • Method Details

    • init

      default void init​(@Nonnull NodeState state)
      Called when plugin loading is complete. This method is the first callback to be called and is guaranteed to run only once.

      Blocking in this method is not a problem, but will delay node initialization.
      Parameters:
      state - State of the node.
      See Also:
      NodeState

    • configurePlayerManager

      default void configurePlayerManager​(@Nonnull NodeState state, @Nonnull com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.player.AudioPlayerManager manager)
      Called to allow configuration of an audio player manager. May be called more than once with different player managers.
      Plugins should not change the output format of the manager.

      Blocking in this method is not a problem, but will delay node initialization.
      Parameters:
      state - State of the node.
      manager - Player manager to configure.
      See Also:
      NodeState, AudioPlayerManager

    • requiresRouter

      default boolean requiresRouter()
      Whether or not this plugin requires a router to work. If this returns true, a router will always be created, regardless of other settings. This method might not be called.
      Even if this returns false, a router may still be created and configureRouter() may be called. Returning true only ensures the creation, returning false doesn't stop it.
      A router will be created if any of these conditions are met
      • HTTP or WebSocket transports are enabled
      • Prometheus metrics are enabled
      • Any plugins returns true on this method


      Blocking in this method is not a problem, but will delay node initialization.
      Returns:
      Whether or not this plugin requires a router.

    • configureRouter

      default void configureRouter​(@Nonnull NodeState state, @Nonnull Router router)
      Called to allow injecting custom routes on the provided router. Only called if the HTTP server is enabled (see requiresRouter() for HTTP server creation conditions).

      Blocking in this method is not a problem, but will delay node initialization.
      Parameters:
      state - State of the node.
      router - Root router used by the node.
      See Also:
      NodeState, Router

    • startListeners

      default boolean startListeners​(@Nonnull NodeState state)
      Starts custom listeners for this plugin. If the default listeners are disabled and no plugin has custom listeners, the process will exit.

      Blocking in this method is not a problem, but will delay node initialization.
      Parameters:
      state - State of the node.
      Returns:
      True if a listener was started.
      See Also:
      NodeState

    • onRawHttpRequest

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue default Plugin.HookResult onRawHttpRequest​(@Nonnull NodeState state, @Nonnull RoutingContext context)
      Called when a REST request is received. Runs on the event loop, so blocking should be avoided.
      Parameters:
      state - State of the node.
      context - Context for the request.
      Returns:
      Whether or not other handlers should be called.
      See Also:
      NodeState, RoutingContext, Plugin.HookResult

    • onRawWebSocketPayload

      @Nonnull @CheckReturnValue default Plugin.HookResult onRawWebSocketPayload​(@Nonnull NodeState nodeState, @Nonnull WebSocketState wsState, @Nonnull JsonObject payload)
      Called when a websocket payload is received. Runs on the event loop, so blocking should be avoided.
      Parameters:
      nodeState - State of the node.
      wsState - State of the websocket connection.
      payload - Payload received.
      Returns:
      Whether or not other handlers should be called.
      See Also:
      NodeState, WebSocketState, Plugin.HookResult
